db.title: Graphic Design
db.about:
Please allow me to introduce myself. I am Lam Thai Quynh Truc, a student at International University (VNU - HCMC) who is is graduated in Biotechnology Bachelor.
You can refer more in the attached CV and Portfolio that I have composed by myself. Link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_zdYJG3k7-QVHliWF9wN1AweGM
I believe that I can partly contribute to your company success. At the same time I can grow myself by learning from colleagues during working on promotion projects.
Please give me a ring or send email if you think I am qualified for an interview.
Thank you for your attention and looking forward to receiving your kind reply.
